name: ISolated
description: ISolated is a digital agency that provides competitive solutions for SEO & SEM, social media marketing, and web analytics. ISolated is made up of a strong senior management team well-versed in the world of marketing and communication. Its portfolio includes companies like Flex, EURO 6000, Míele, OKI, Gala Sanitaryware, Cool Corner, Polaris, EOI, and Cryo Cord.
